law.full_text:
PROMULGATION OF RULES AND REGULATIONS.
The Rent Adjustment Commission of the City of Los Angeles and the Los Angeles Housing Department shall have the authority to adopt policies, rules and regulations to effectuate the purposes of this Article, and to implement, administer, and enforce the provisions of this Article.

unit.label: article
unit.name: Eviction Of Tenants From Foreclosed Residential Rental Properties

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
PROMULGATION OF RULES AND REGULATIONS. (§ 49.94)
PROMULGATION OF RULES AND REGULATIONS. The Rent Adjustment Commission of the City of Los Angeles and the Los Angeles Housing Department shall have the authority to adopt policies, rules and regulations to effectuate the purposes of this Article, and to implement, administer, and enforce the provisions of this Article.

PROMULGATION OF RULES AND REGULATIONS.

The Rent Adjustment Commission of the City of Los Angeles and the Los Angeles Housing Department shall have the authority to adopt policies, rules and regulations to effectuate the purposes of this Article, and to implement, administer, and enforce the provisions of this Article.
